main event: A civilian pilot reported a sighting of a peculiar cloud formation resembling a vertical pillar with a mushroom top while flying at 6,300 feet.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 14 Sep 1961 at 1700 hours,The cloud-like formation was estimated to be 300 to 600 miles away on a 200-degree heading,The observation lasted for approximately 20 minutes,The object was observed from initially 330 miles away and developed a mushroom shape as it extended upwards,There were multiple military and governmental entities informed of the sighting.
sighted object: a peculiar cloud formation with a vertical pillar
witness description: A civilian pilot flying a CIESNA 150.
